The quote in question is a partial quote: selectively chosen from the book "Carbon Shift: How Peak Oil and the Climate Crisis Will Change Canada (and Our Lives)," written by David Hughes and co-edited by Homer-Dixon.
Homer: Dixon addressed the inaccurate quote in a blog post, stating that the poster circulating on the web is fraudulent and that he didn't write the text.
The full text of the quote provides addi: stating that at a good wind site, the energy payback day could be in three years or less, but in a poor location, energy payback may be never.
